channel.title: Changing wearing requirments
channel.description:
How to change def lvl requirment (example i want to wear dds with attack lvl 1 noth 60) ????
pls help =)[br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2007, 06:39:49 AM[/size][hr]bump !!:D i need fast help -.-

item.title: Changing wearing requirments
item.dc:creator: @Stilles Stilles
item.description:
@Stilles wrote:

Open your client.java and search for /*Equipment level checking*/

Right under it should be something like public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 5; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 99; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 30; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 40; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 99;

Change the return ## to what you want it to be.

Read full topic
